string-array.name: st_sofia
string-array.item: 8-foot statue of St. Sophia, rises pylon 14 meters high in the heart of Sofia. Author of monumental sculpture is the famous Bulgarian sculptor Georgi Chapkanov.
Sofia, at the juncture of Maria Louisa, Alexander Dondukov and Todor Alexandrov boulevards. \nLocation: 42.697939,23.321503 (Click to see on the map)
